snippet: The Giants produced only 13 first downs in a 24-20 loss to the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday, and only 11 the previous week against the Dallas Cowboys.
abstract: Struggling New York Giants look to fix offense before upcoming game against Cincinnati Bengals.
lead_paragraph: The Giants produced only 13 first downs in a 24-20 loss to the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday, and only 11 the previous week against the Dallas Cowboys.

headline.seo: Giants Look to Fix Offense Before Bengals Game
headline.main: Suddenly Sputtering, Giants Look to Fix Offense
headline.print_headline: Suddenly Sputtering, Giants Look to Fix Offense
